message.raw:
refs #369

Added initial code for monitoring when the connection table changes. Currently it only watches the .py connection table file and the compiled .h5.

This involved implementing a generic "notification bar" which we will use for other warnings, like notifying the user that about the BLACS SVN status.

To Do:
* Check files on startup to see if they were modified while BLACS was closed
* Implement compilation of connection table, and auto-restart of BLACS (requires #439)
* implement settings dialog to select globals and calibration files/folders to watch and compile with
